package.name: jcv_kinect_denoising
package.description: This is a metapackage. This metapackage includes jcv_hole_filling and jcv_temporal_denoising package. jcv_hole_filling is for filling invalid pixels and denoising spatial noise in kinect frames. jcv_bilateral_filter is for denoising spatial-temporal noise in kinect frames.
package.author: Vahid Azizi
